hero.headline: Sim Studio Explodes: Open-Source AI Agent Workflow Platform Gains 1,463 Stars in One Day
hero.summary: SimStudioAI's open-source platform for building and deploying AI agent workflows shot to the top of GitHub trending with 1,463 stars today. The TypeScript-based visual workflow builder lets developers and non-technical users alike orchestrate multiple AI agents, chain prompts, and deploy complex automation workflows without writing code.
hero.whyItMatters: This signals growing demand for visual, no-code approaches to AI agent orchestration. As agents become more capable, the bottleneck shifts from 'can AI do this?' to 'how do I coordinate multiple agents?' Sim Studio's explosive growth shows developers want Zapier-like simplicity for agent workflows, not just raw API access.

topStories.title: OpenAI Codex Hits GitHub Trending with 1,174 Stars Today
topStories.summary: OpenAI's lightweight terminal coding agent surged to the top of GitHub trending. The Rust-based CLI offers a streamlined alternative to Claude Code, featuring GPT-5.1-Codex-Max model, cloud execution with remote compaction, and improved Windows/PowerShell support.

topStories.title: Claude Code Hits $1B Annualized Revenue in Just 6 Months
topStories.summary: Claude Code reached $1 billion in annualized revenue run rate only about six months after becoming generally available. Menlo Ventures reports Anthropic now holds 40% of enterprise market share and 54% in coding, up from 32% in summer 2025.

topStories.title: Foundations of LLMs: Comprehensive Open-Source Book Gains 478 Stars
topStories.summary: A new comprehensive book for learning the foundations of Large Language Models from Zhejiang University shot up GitHub trending. Covers architecture, training, and applications with academic rigor - filling a gap in formal LLM education resources.

topStories.title: Accenture and Anthropic Announce Major Partnership: 30,000 Professionals to Train on Claude
topStories.summary: Accenture and Anthropic established a multi-year strategic partnership, with Anthropic becoming one of Accenture's select partners. Approximately 30,000 Accenture professionals will be trained on Claude, signaling enterprise-scale AI adoption.

trendingRepos.name: openai/codex
trendingRepos.description: Lightweight coding agent that runs in your terminal. Rust-based CLI with GPT-5.1-Codex-Max model, cloud execution, and improved sandbox security.

trendingRepos.name: ZJU-LLMs/Foundations-of-LLMs
trendingRepos.description: A comprehensive book for learning the foundations of Large Language Models. Covers architecture, training, and applications with academic rigor.

trendingRepos.name: daytonaio/daytona
trendingRepos.description: Secure and elastic infrastructure for running AI-generated code. Provides isolated development environments for safely executing agent-produced code.

trendingRepos.name: HKUDS/DeepCode
trendingRepos.description: Open Agentic Coding: Paper2Code, Text2Web, and Text2Backend. Transforms research papers into working code and natural language into full web applications.

trendingSkills.name: Context Engineering Framework
trendingSkills.description: Converts unstructured information into AI-interpretable structured formats through autonomous context extraction. Essential for building effective AI workflows.

trendingSkills.name: Claude Code X Autonomous Execution
trendingSkills.description: Enables parallel execution of up to 5 concurrent Claude Code sessions for well-defined tasks. Dramatically accelerate complex multi-file refactoring or feature implementations.

trendingSkills.name: Vexor CLI
trendingSkills.description: Performs semantic file discovery by intent/meaning rather than exact text matching. Find files based on what they do, not just their names or contents.

trendingSkills.name: Git Workflow with Conventional Commits
trendingSkills.description: Automates staging, committing with standardized format, PR creation, and branch management. Enforces clean git history with conventional commit messages.

newMcpServers.name: sqlite-mcp-server
newMcpServers.description: Transforms SQLite into an AI-ready database engine with advanced analytics, text/vector search, geospatial capabilities, and intelligent workflow automation.

newMcpServers.name: database-server
newMcpServers.description: Comprehensive database server supporting PostgreSQL, MySQL, and SQLite with natural language SQL query capabilities. Ask questions in plain English, get SQL results.

newMcpServers.name: rust-mcp-filesystem
newMcpServers.description: High-performance async filesystem operations in Rust. Secure by default (read-only mode), with precise targeting for LLMs to edit specific file sections.

newMcpServers.name: mcp-hackernews
newMcpServers.description: Access Hacker News stories, comments, and user data with search and content retrieval. Stay informed about tech community discussions through AI.

notableHooks.name: Auto-Format TypeScript
notableHooks.description: Automatically runs Prettier on TypeScript files after any Edit|Write operation. Uses jq to extract file path and conditionally formats .ts files.

notableHooks.name: Block Sensitive File Edits
notableHooks.description: Prevents Claude from editing .env, package-lock.json, or .git/ files. Returns exit code 2 to block the operation with a message explaining why.

notableHooks.name: Log All Bash Commands
notableHooks.description: Logs every shell command Claude runs to ~/.claude/bash-command-log.txt with timestamps. Perfect for auditing AI agent actions and debugging workflows.

tuiTools.name: lazygit
tuiTools.description: Simple terminal UI for git commands. Keyboard-driven workflow with staging, committing, branch management, and conflict resolution all from one interface.

tuiTools.name: yazi
tuiTools.description: Blazing fast terminal file manager written in Rust. Beautiful UI, async I/O, and integration with fzf, ripgrep, and image previews.

tuiTools.name: rainfrog
tuiTools.description: Database manager TUI for Postgres, MySQL, and SQLite. Browse tables, run queries, and explore schemas with a beautiful ratatui interface.

tuiTools.name: posting
tuiTools.description: A powerful HTTP client that lives in your terminal. Built with Textual for a beautiful Python-based TUI experience with request history and collections.

highlights: Thinking mode enabled by default for Opus 4.5 with configuration via /config
Enterprise managed settings for organization-wide policy enforcement
Fixed IME composition window positioning for CJK language input
Persistent 'Always Allow' policies with granular shell and MCP support
MCP Resources support for expanded protocol capabilities
Gemini 2.5 Flash Lite model support via -m flag
Remote compaction enabled for API-key based sessions
Cloud exec --branch for remote runs with status/diff/apply flows

notableQuotes.quote: Developers can now tag @Claude to spin up a complete coding session using Slack context like bug reports or feature requests. Claude analyzes recent messages to determine the right repository.
notableQuotes.author: TechCrunch
notableQuotes.role: Reporting on Claude Code Slack Launch

notableQuotes.quote: Anthropic now holds 40% of enterprise market share and 54% in coding, up from 32% in summer 2025. Claude Code reached $1 billion in annualized revenue in just six months.
notableQuotes.author: Menlo Ventures Report

notableQuotes.quote: Approximately 30,000 Accenture professionals will be trained on Claude as part of our multi-year strategic collaboration with Anthropic.
notableQuotes.author: Accenture

prompt: Daily AI news digest for December 15, 2025. Hero: Sim Studio explodes with 1,463 stars - open-source AI agent workflow platform tops GitHub trending. Top stories: OpenAI Codex trending (1,174 stars), Claude Code $1B ARR milestone, Foundations of LLMs book (478 stars), Accenture training 30k on Claude. Fresh repos: openai/codex, ZJU-LLMs/Foundations-of-LLMs, daytonaio/daytona, HKUDS/DeepCode. New skills from SkillsMP: context-engineering-framework, claude-code-x-autonomous, vexor-cli, git-workflow-conventional. MCP servers: sqlite-mcp-server, database-server, rust-mcp-filesystem, mcp-hackernews. Notable hooks: auto-format-typescript, block-sensitive-files, log-bash-commands. TUI tools: lazygit, yazi, rainfrog, posting. Tool updates: Claude Code 2.0.69, Gemini CLI 0.21.0-preview, Codex 0.72.0.
